homeSection.title: From Concept to Code.
homeSection.description: I enjoy turning ideas into reality by engaging in every layer of a project, from building solid logic, designing intuitive interfaces, to managing data in an organized manner. I believe a great application is a blend of powerful functionality and seamless user experience.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Showcase
portfolio.desc: Explore my journey through projects, certifications, and technical expertise. Each section represents a milestone in my continuous learning path.

aboutmee.title: About Me
aboutmee.name: Putri Ayunda Gustiara
aboutmee.description: I am a Web Developer with strong experience in building REST APIs using Java & Spring Boot. Besides backend, I also work on frontend development using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Currently, I am a D3 Management Informatics student at Universitas Nasional Pasim Bandung. My main goal is to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems while continuously learning and growing as a developer.

list.cLogic: Logic and Algorithm Training using the C Language

c.title: C Language | Nail Art Ayunda
c.descShort: Cashier program in C via CMD to list services, process payments, and print receipts.
c.descLong: A command-line based cashier application built with C language to assist in recording nail art services. The app can display a list of services, calculate total transactions, perform basic input validation, and automatically print payment receipts.
features: Admin also acts as the user
Display list of nail art services

java1.title: PureFresh Laundry
java1.descShort: Web app with CRUD features using Java Spring Boot and Thymeleaf.
java1.descLong: A laundry management system created with Java Spring Boot and Thymeleaf, enabling admin and staff to handle orders, customers, and transaction reports efficiently. Focused on implementing fundamental CRUD operations with a clean UI.

html.title: HTML + CSS + JavaScript | Elysian Gamer
html.descShort: Free online gaming website with an attractive interface and easy access.
html.descLong: A web-based gaming portal built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides free games with simple yet engaging graphics and interactive gameplay. The website is also optimized for fast loading and responsive design across various devices.
features: Fetch game data from external API

java2.title: HayMart REST APIs
java2.descShort: REST API for managing sales, inventory, and reports using Spring Boot + MySQL.
java2.descLong: A RESTful API project that powers the HayMart system, providing endpoints for sales, product inventory, and financial reports. Built using Spring Boot with MySQL database integration, ensuring scalability and robust data management.
features: JWT login & password management (OTP via email)

php.title: Koperasi Simpan Pinjam
php.descShort: PHP-MySQL web app for cooperative management: members, savings, and loans.
php.descLong: A cooperative management application developed with PHP and MySQL. It helps cooperatives manage member registrations, track savings, record loans, and handle repayment schedules, making financial processes more transparent and efficient.
features: Default owner (main admin) with full control
CRUD management for admins, members, savings, loans, and installments
Restricted admin role (can manage members, savings, loans, and installments but not other admins)
Centralized admin dashboard for monitoring cooperative activities

react.title: Skintizen
react.descShort: Frontend app to browse and order Skintific products, built with React + Tailwind.
react.descLong: A modern e-commerce frontend built with React and Tailwind CSS. The application allows users to browse skincare products, add items to the cart, and place orders. Focuses on delivering a smooth user experience with reusable React components.

profile.title: Profile
profile.desc: An Associate Degree student in Informatics Management with skills in Java programming, covering OOP implementation, REST API development, and application building using Spring Boot. Experienced with SQL for database management and web development using JavaScript, React.js, Tailwind, and HTML on the frontend. Basic understanding of C programming for logic, and experience as a Teaching Assistant supporting academic activities.
